name: 陳昭榮
objective:
一、線性連立方程式。二、矩陣基本運算。三、行列式。四、向量空間。
五、內積空間。六、線性轉換。七、特徵值與特徵向量
schedule:
Week 1: 課程介紹， 數學證明概述 (Appendix)
Week 2: Systems of Linear Equations (Chapter 1)
Week 3-4: Matrices (Chapter 2)
Week 5: Determinants (Chapter 3)
Week 6: 期中考(Ch.1-3)
Week 7-9: Vector Spaces (Chapter 4)
Week 10-11:Inner Product Spaces (Chapter 5)
Week 12,14: Linear Transformations (Chapter 6)
Week 13: 期中考 (Ch.4-5)
Week 15-17: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (Chapter 7)
Week 18: 期末考(Ch.6-7)
materials:
使用教材：翁慶昌編譯，Ron Larson原著, 線性代數,7th Edition, 高立，2013。
